description.text:
I think I will feel right at home with you. 
As they say $(b;autumn)'Home is where the heart is!'$() - The pixie winks at you - 
Every home needs good home cooked food! So let's make some preparations shall we. 
First we need to $(b;spring)craft$() a $(b;autumn)Cooking Knife$(), don't you agree Darling?
Wonderful! And you got that so fast! $(b;autumn)'A good Cook is defined by his tools!'$()
